name: ElonTechnology
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Add this skill to keep up-to-date on the latest in technology news at Elon University, including highlights of faculty who incorporate technology, phishing and scam alerts, and updates on what we're working on.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
